name: Tremmlings
description:
Tremmlings are looking to get home! Help them find the way in this puzzle game.


Big thanks to my lovely wife and her sister for playtesting. 

Made in Godot Engine for GMTK game jam.

Tremmling model based on Viernes model by Jonás from Sketchfab.
Japanese woodblock - Color Palette
Chris Zabriskie - Music
Pixelbuddha - Willful font
Sounds - FreeSFX
